Pre-Game Insights: Malawi is looking for their second win of the 2026 FIFA World Cup qualifiers
Sao Tome is looking for their first win of the campaign
Malawi has accumulated only three points in the bag from two games and sits in fourth position in Group H
Sao Tome was crushed 4-0 by Tunisia in their opening game and lost to Namibia 2-0
Miscellaneous Highlights: This is the first official clash between the sides in history
Others: Sao Tome has not won a game since March 2022
Sao Tome has failed to score in six of their last seven games
Malawi has lost their last three official games
Sao Tome is one of the eight teams in the CAF zone who have lost both their qualifying matches so far
